explains: n. 抢劫；洗劫，趁乱打劫
v. 打劫（loot 的现在分词）

sentences.en: The rebels went looting and pillaging.
sentences.cn: 叛乱者趁火打劫，掠夺财物。

sentences.en: In the country's largest cities there has been rioting and looting.
sentences.cn: 在这个国家的大城市里一直都有暴乱和抢劫事件发生。

sentences.en: Marauding gangs of armed men have been looting food relief supplies.
sentences.cn: 持械抢劫团伙一直在四处抢劫救济食品。
